home.name: Maxim
home.description: I have been working in IT since 2010. Mostly worked as a system administrator and as a programmer. At work I often had to program. I have experience in programming in Delphi. I created clients to work with databases: MS SQL, MySQL, Firebird. The institute had a course on HTMS, CSS. After graduation, I was engaged in page layout for some time. Participated in the development of the Institute's website. Iâ€™ve also created an application for learning languages on React and project management system Trello-clone on React + Typescript.I want to become a professional developer. I am ready to develop in this direction.
home.ed1: Balashovsky Institute of Saratov State University / Applied Informatics in Economics
home.exp1: 2008 - 2009 / Balashovsky Institute of Saratov State University / Laboratorian
home.exp2: 2010 - 2011 / Balashovsky Institute of Saratov State University / Engineer (Developer)
home.exp4: 2015 - 2018 / Urban Heating Networks Balashov / Specialist (System administrator)
home.exp5: 2018 - 2019 / Urban Heating Networks Balashov / Network administrator
home.exp6: 2020 - until now / MFC / Leading Specialist (System administrator)

cards.game2048: The goal of the game is to get the number 2048 by moving the chips with the keyboard arrows.
cards.seabattle: A game from childhood. Arrange the ships in the dock yourself or leave it to the computer. And go into battle against the computer.
cards.Sapper: Game from Windows. Which was removed from Windows 10. Find all the bombs on the field.
cards.math-game: A game for the development of memory. You can choose the difficulty and pictures, and you can also play for a while.
cards.trello: A project management system is an application that helps an individual in a team or a group of developers achieve their goals.
cards.rslang: RS Lang is an application for learning foreign words with the technique of interval repetition, tracking individual progress and mini-games.
cards.momentum: Analog of a Chrome application . The app shows the time, date and weather. The background image and greeting change depending on the time of day. The app also has an image slider, an audio player, a quote block, a todo list and a lot of configuration options (language, list of blocks, image source, image categories). Local storage stores a user name and a selected location.
cards.artquiz: An entertaining game for art lovers that has two game modes - artist quiz or picture quiz. In the settings, you can change the language, select a time mode, turn on or turn off the sound. Local storage stores data about completed rounds and the settings. This game is a single page application.
cards.christmas: A game where you can choose your favorite toys, decorate a Christmas tree and make a lovely card for your friends and family. This is a single page application.

To the all his collection of cars to be precise. He is eager to create kind of drag-racing competition in order to discover which car fastest. !!! To work, you need to start the server locally.
